hero.title: xMatix People
hero.description1: Onboard faster. Manage clearly. Adapt continuously.
hero.description2: xMatix People helps organizations execute workforce operations across the employee lifecycle with governed workflows, real time coordination, and compliance readiness.

cardsData.title: The problem
cardsData.content: People operations often rely on manual handoffs, inconsistent processes, and disconnected systems.

cardsData.title: The xMatix Approach
cardsData.content: xMatix People standardizes how workforce actions are executed so every employee lifecycle event follows a consistent and auditable process.

keyCapabilities.title: Core Capabilities
keyCapabilities.description2: xMatix People modernizes people execution without replacing existing HR or payroll systems while improving speed, clarity, and control.

cardsData.title: Employee Lifecycle Execution
cardsData.description: Orchestrate onboarding, role changes, transfers, and exits through standardized workflows.

cardsData.title: Policy Based Approvals
cardsData.description: Apply HR policies and approval rules automatically during execution.

cardsData.title: Cross Function Coordination
cardsData.description: Align people actions with IT access, payroll, finance, and facilities.

cardsData.title: Compliance and Documentation
cardsData.description: Ensure required steps, acknowledgements, and records are completed.

cardsData.title: Adaptable Workforce Processes
cardsData.description: Update execution flows quickly without system rewrites.

requestADemo.heading: See xMatix People in Action
requestADemo.description: Improve employee experience, reduce delays, and maintain compliance without disrupting existing systems.
